reviewText:
This is real daoist Qigong and REAL longevity - real practice from a real 90 years old man. I have great doubts about the future longevity of Tommy "James" if he continue to pratice ZhangQuan for more than 5 minutes.

Static postures are just for short minded "martial workers" not for daoists. And standing half hours like a stone is just death of mind and naturalness. Laozi said life is just the flow...
